title: Exiled media will leave grant dependency behind
description: In 2026, exiled media outlets will overhaul their business models, leaving behind grant dependency and moving toward diversified schemes that include products and services that their audiences — especially readers in the diaspora — are willing to pay for. This year began with a shock: the funding freeze of U.S. international cooperation and the dismantling...
